scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn register-workflows && react-scripts build
scripts.buildStart: DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false FORCE_COLOR=true react-app-rewired start | cat
scripts.buildWatch: WORKSPACES="$(yarn workspaces list --json)" npm explore @clutch-sh/tools -- yarn run buildWatch compile:watch buildStart $INIT_CWD
scripts.compile:watch: yarn workspaces foreach -Aip -j unlimited run compile:watch
scripts.lint: yarn register-workflows && eslint --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx src && yarn workspaces foreach -Ap -j unlimited --include 'workflows/*' run lint
scripts.register-workflows: npm explore @clutch-sh/tools -- yarn run registerWorkflows $INIT_CWD/src clutch-dev.config.js
scripts.start: yarn run clean && yarn run register-workflows && yarn run buildWatch
scripts.test:coverage: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap -j unlimited --include 'workflows/*' run test:coverage
scripts.test:watch: yarn workspaces foreach -Aip -j unlimited --include 'workflows/*' run test:watch
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap -j unlimited --include 'workflows/*' run test
